title: Logflare
shortDescription: Inspect your Cloudflare logs. Analyze in Google Data Studio.
longDescription:
Consolidate all your logs with Logflare. From the edge to servers, bring all your logs to one place with Logflare.

### FREE
* Logflare is free for up to 5,200,000 event logs per month. One request to your site is one event log.

### NEW
* Setup the Logflare Slack app to get alerts in your Slack channels!

### Realtime
* Stream logs to your browser in realtime

### Alerts
* Slack alerts with the Slack app
* Email & SMS alerts to you and other team members
* Trigger alerts as quickly as every 60 seconds

### Search
* Quickly search your Cloudflare logs
* A simple Logflare Query Language lets you easily query structured data
* Chart search results data to understand patterns easily 
* Save searches for quick analysis

### Storage
* 7 days of free log storage
* Backed by Google BigQuery
* Configure your own Google Cloud Platform account
* Unlimited log storage when you bring your own BigQuery account

### Dashboards
* Build dashboards in Google Data Studio
* Share Data Studio dashboards with your whole team

### And more
* Send custom logs via API request
* Log routing
* Display timestamps in local time or UTC
* Share logs with public urls
instructions: When you sign up for Logflare you'll create a source. Sources are where your logs go. Simply add a source and complete the install process. The app will install a worker in your Cloudflare account that logs all request data to your Logflare source. The worker does this asynchronously so as to not slow down your website at all.
author: Logflare

categories.title: Insights
categories.description: Apps that provide insight into your visitors.

enumNames.signin: Sign in to select a source

source.title: Source

proposedApp.title: Logflare
proposedApp.shortDescription: Tail -f your Cloudflare logs.
proposedApp.longDescription:
Cosolidate all your logs with Logflare. From the edge to servers, bring all your logs to one place with Logflare.

* Free
* Open source
* Stream logs to your browser
* Send custom logs via API request
* Watch log files with the agent
* 1,000 log entries per source
* Up to 100 sources per account
* Logs older than 30 days are deleted
* Log routing
* Local time & UTC
* Share logs with public urls
proposedApp.instructions: When you sign up for Logflare you'll create a source. Sources are where your logs go. Simply add a source and complete the install process. The app will install a worker in your Cloudflare account that logs all request data to your Logflare source. The worker does this asynchronously so as to not slow down your website at all.
proposedApp.author: Chase Granberry

versions.releaseNotes:
* Sending all request and response headers as metadata to Logflare
* Added origin response time to metadata
* Saving 7 days of logs in Google Big Query with metadata
* Make dashboards from logs and metadata with Google Data Studio
* If you logged in with your Google account the Big Query table is automatically available to query in your Google Cloud account, and also automatically available in your Google Data Studio
* Easily inspect metadata from the log console in Logflare

* Notifications in Slack with the new Logflare Slack app

proposedApp.title: Logflare
proposedApp.shortDescription: Inspect your Cloudflare logs. Analyze in Google Data Studio.
proposedApp.longDescription:
Cosolidate all your logs with Logflare. From the edge to servers, bring all your logs to one place with Logflare.

### NEW
* Setup the Logflare Slack app to get alerts in your Slack channels!

### Realtime
* Stream logs to your browser in realtime

### Alerts
* Slack alerts with the Slack app
* Email & SMS alerts to you and other team members
* Trigger alerts as quickly as every 60 seconds

### Search
* Quickly search your Cloudflare logs
* A simple Logflare Query Language lets you easily query structured data
* Chart search results data to understand patterns easily 
* Save searches for quick analysis

### Storage
* 7 days of free log storage
* Backed by Google BigQuery
* Configure your own Google Cloud Platform account
* Unlimited log storage when you bring your own BigQuery account

### Dashboards
* Build dashboards in Google Data Studio
* Share Data Studio dashboards with your whole team

### And more
* Send custom logs via API request
* Log routing
* Display timestamps in local time or UTC
* Share logs with public urls
proposedApp.instructions: When you sign up for Logflare you'll create a source. Sources are where your logs go. Simply add a source and complete the install process. The app will install a worker in your Cloudflare account that logs all request data to your Logflare source. The worker does this asynchronously so as to not slow down your website at all.
proposedApp.author: Logflare LLC

ipInfoApiKey.description: Include your IPInfo.io API key and get enriched data on IP addresses.
ipInfoApiKey.title: IP Address Data Enrichment (optional)

source.description: Which source should we send logs to?

enumNames.signin: Sign in to select a source

source.title: Source

failure.message: There was an error communicating with Logflare.

versions.releaseNotes:
- Notifications in Slack with the new Logflare Slack app
- Going 1.0 as our Cloudflare worker and platform are stable
- Batching in workers to fix occasional 429 status codes for sites with lots of programmatic API traffic

proposedApp.title: Logflare
proposedApp.shortDescription: Inspect your Cloudflare logs. Analyze in Google Data Studio.
proposedApp.longDescription:
Cosolidate all your logs with Logflare. From the edge to servers, bring all your logs to one place with Logflare.

### FREE
* Logflare is free for up to 5,200,000 event logs per month. One request to your site is one event log.

### NEW
* Setup the Logflare Slack app to get alerts in your Slack channels!

### Realtime
* Stream logs to your browser in realtime

### Alerts
* Slack alerts with the Slack app
* Email & SMS alerts to you and other team members
* Trigger alerts as quickly as every 60 seconds

### Search
* Quickly search your Cloudflare logs
* A simple Logflare Query Language lets you easily query structured data
* Chart search results data to understand patterns easily 
* Save searches for quick analysis

### Storage
* 7 days of free log storage
* Backed by Google BigQuery
* Configure your own Google Cloud Platform account
* Unlimited log storage when you bring your own BigQuery account

### Dashboards
* Build dashboards in Google Data Studio
* Share Data Studio dashboards with your whole team

### And more
* Send custom logs via API request
* Log routing
* Display timestamps in local time or UTC
* Share logs with public urls
proposedApp.instructions: When you sign up for Logflare you'll create a source. Sources are where your logs go. Simply add a source and complete the install process. The app will install a worker in your Cloudflare account that logs all request data to your Logflare source. The worker does this asynchronously so as to not slow down your website at all.
proposedApp.author: Logflare

ipInfoApiKey.description: Include your IPInfo.io API key and get enriched data on IP addresses.
ipInfoApiKey.title: IP Address Data Enrichment (optional)

source.description: Which source should we send logs to?

enumNames.signin: Sign in to select a source

source.title: Source

failure.message: There was an error communicating with Logflare.

versions.releaseNotes:
* Notifications in Slack with the new Logflare Slack app
* Going 1.0 as our Cloudflare worker and platform are stable
* Batching in workers to fix occasional 429 status codes for sites with lots of programmatic API traffic
